name: Angels & Demons Strategy
content:
Survival puzzle. Citizens spawn from portals and walk toward exits. Demons fire bolts that curse citizens on contact (-1). Angels fire salvation that blesses citizens (+100). You lose if any citizen gets cursed. Survive 1000 ticks to win. Push boxes to block demon bolts (bolt hits box: +1). Avoid bolts yourself (-5). Do not block angel salvation paths.

AVAILABLE ACTIONS: {{availableActions}}
